channel.title: Accounts problem
channel.description: I'm using easyrsc and people can log into or make as many accounts as they want, I was just wondering how would i go upon making it were they could only create a certain amount of accounts? also if anyone knows anything on a ip ban system that could help to thanks.

item.title: Accounts problem
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

There was a thread like this before, you need to add something in your login files to search another file for an ip and a date/time created. Also, when a account is created, it needs to store the ip and date/time created.

Read full topic
